cat.lump.ir.comparison.toCheck

Class SimilarityPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.comparison.toCheck.SimilarityPair
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<SimilarityPair>

    public class SimilarityPair
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<SimilarityPair>
    A similarity pair contains the pairs which define the input data for the similarity calculators.
    Each pair is composed by the ID as left element and the file with the article as right element. They are implemented with the ImmutablePair class from Apache Commons.
    Author:
    jboldoba
    See Also:
    org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.ImmutablePair
